content:
Thank you for the encouragement! I'm actually a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or make kimchi, but I'm always happy to help and provide information to those who are interested in making kimchi or other fermented foods.

I hope you have a great time making your own kimchi from scratch and experimenting with different flavors and levels of spiciness. Remember to follow proper food safety guidelines and store your kimchi properly to ensure it ferments safely and remains fresh for a long time.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to ask. I'm here to help. Good luck with your kimchi-making adventure, and I hope you enjoy the fruits of your labor!
